FAQ_SECTION.SECTION_SUBTITLE: Get answers to common questions about our mixers
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_1_QUESTION: How do I operate the MT-370 and MT-480 mixers?
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_1_ANSWER: Watch our detailed demonstration video below:
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_2_ANSWER: Regular maintenance includes daily cleaning, weekly lubrication checks, and monthly mechanical inspections.
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_3_QUESTION: Which mixer is right for my project?
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_3_ANSWER: The MT-370 is ideal for residential and small commercial projects, while the MT-480 is designed for larger commercial applications.
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_4_ANSWER: We provide a comprehensive 2-year warranty on all components, with extended warranty options available.
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_5_ANSWER: Yes, we maintain a complete inventory of spare parts with next-day delivery for most components.
